title: How to Create Two Accounts in Clash of Clans on One Android Device

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans if you haven't already.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans if you haven't already. It has an icon with the image of a guy wearing a yellow helmet. Tap the icon on your home screen or apps drawer to launch Clash of Clans.

steps.title: Tap the settings icon.
steps.content: Tap the settings icon. It's the icon that resembles three gears in the lower-right corner. You'll find it right above the shop. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Connected button to the right of "Supercell ID."
steps.content: Tap the Connected button to the right of "Supercell ID." [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the settings button in the Supercell ID screen.
steps.content: Tap the settings button in the Supercell ID screen.

steps.title: Tap Log Out in the settings menu and tap Confirm.
steps.content: Tap Log Out in the settings menu and tap Confirm. You will be taken to the title screen. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans if you haven't already.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans if you haven't already. It has an icon with the image of a guy wearing a yellow helmet. Tap the icon on your home screen or apps drawer to launch Clash of Clans.

steps.title: On the title screen, tap the faded "Play without Supercell ID" button.
steps.content: On the title screen, tap the faded "Play without Supercell ID" button. It may appear to be unselectable, but the option is actually available when presented. [5] X Research source

steps.title: You will be presented with the Clash of Clans tutorial.
steps.content: You will be presented with the Clash of Clans tutorial. Follow the steps in the Create a Supercell ID section to create another Supercell ID account.

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans if you haven't already.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans if you haven't already. It has an icon with the image of a guy wearing a yellow helmet. Tap the icon on your home screen or apps drawer to launch Clash of Clans.

steps.title: Tap the settings icon.
steps.content: Tap the settings icon. It's the icon that resembles three gears. You'll find it right above the shop, or in the top left corner during the tutorial. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Disconnected button next to "Supercell ID."
steps.content: Tap the Disconnected button next to "Supercell ID." [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the blue Register Now link, then tap Continue on the next screen.
steps.content: Tap the blue Register Now link, then tap Continue on the next screen.

steps.title: Type in your Email address in both boxes presented and click Register.
steps.content: Type in your Email address in both boxes presented and click Register.

steps.title: A message will be sent to your Email address, type in the code presented in the message in the code box and press Submit.
steps.content: A message will be sent to your Email address, type in the code presented in the message in the code box and press Submit.

steps.title: Click the Okay option to exit the creation process.
steps.content: Click the Okay option to exit the creation process.

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans if you haven't already.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans if you haven't already. It has an icon with the image of a guy wearing a yellow helmet. Tap the icon on your home screen or apps drawer to launch Clash of Clans.

steps.title: Tap the settings icon.
steps.content: Tap the settings icon. It's the icon that resembles three gears. You'll find it right above the shop, or in the top left corner during the tutorial.

steps.title: Tap the blue button next to "Connected" which looks like two arrows curving into each other.
steps.content: Tap the blue button next to "Connected" which looks like two arrows curving into each other.

steps.title: If the title screen is shown, tap the "Log in with Supercell ID" button.
steps.content: If the title screen is shown, tap the "Log in with Supercell ID" button. [8] X Research source

steps.title: A list of linked accounts will appear, tap the correct account you want to switch into.
steps.content: A list of linked accounts will appear, tap the correct account you want to switch into.
